about-advisors-brendan: CEO weBrave. Co-muvambi weMozilla. Musiki weiyo JavaScript programming mutauro. Muvaki wemabhurawuza uye nezvimwe.
about-advisors-dawn: Muzvinafundo, CS kuYunivhesiti yeCalifornia, Berkeley. Kudzidza kwakadzika, chengetedzo, blockchain nyanzvi. CEO weOasis Labs.
about-advisors-keiran: Tsvagisa Scientist kuStanford. Kudzidza kwemuchina uye huwandu hwemari kumabhangi makuru, hedge funds, uye academia.
about-content-text-1: hCaptcha ibasa reIntuition Machines Inc, AI uye kambani inodzidzira muchina ine tarisiro pane metalearning uye visual domain ML pachiyero. Isu tinovaka nekushandisa masisitimu akawandisa ekugonesa vhidhiyo nemifananidzo yekuongorora masevhisi emakambani eGlobal 2000 kutenderera pasirese.
about-content-text-2: Mamwe data anowanzo gadzira zvirinani mhedzisiro. Kuvaka uye kuchengetedza nemazvo zvakanyorwa uye zvine chekuita nedhata nguva inopedza uye inodhura. hCaptcha yakatanga kugadzirirwa kugadzirisa zvatinoda isu mukunyora mifananidzo, uye yave kuwanikwa kune mamwe makambani ane zvakafanana zvinodiwa.
about-intro-text: Tiri kukura nekukurumidza uye tinogara tichitsvaga matarenda epasirese epamusoro pamahofisi edu epasirese. Iwe unogona kunyorera neaya maratidziro pazasi.
about-leadership-alex: Dhatabhesi uye Blockchain nyanzvi. Pakutanga mainjiniya kuCloudera uye nezvimwe. Makumi emakore ehunyanzvi hwekuvaka software uye zvikwata.
about-leadership-eli: CEO. Anozivikanwa mutungamiri muAI. Akashandisa muchina ungwaru pachiyero kune akasiyana siyana matambudziko ebhizinesi mumakumi emakore apfuura.
about-leadership-todd: PhD muComputational Biology, Stanford. Kushanda nemaNeural network kubva 1999. Tarisa pane yakashandiswa ML uye kudzidza kwakadzika pachiyero.
acc-opt-text: Iwe wakaona zvisingaite here kana neimwe nzira haugone kupedzisa hCaptchas?
appreciate-in: Tinotenda mazano ako. Regai tizive chero nyaya uye isu tozozvigadzirisa nekukurumidza.
footer-copyright-text: hCaptcha chiratidzo chakanyoreswa cheIntuition Machines, Inc.
home-about-text-1: hCaptcha yakagadzirirwa kugadzirisa rakanyanya basa rakanyanya dambudziko mukudzidza kwemuchina: kunyora huwandu hwedata nenzira inokodzera, inokwanisika, uye yakavimbika.
home-about-text-2: Mamwe data anowanzo gadzira zvirinani mukudzidzisa muchina mamodheru modhi. Kubudirira kwazvino kwema modhi akadzika kwakatungamira kune akawedzera makuru madhataseti, kazhinji nguva dzese nekumwe kuongorora kwevanhu. Nekudaro, kugadzira makuru makuru akaongororwa nevanhu kuburikidza neMechanical Turk, Mufananidzo Vasere, nezvimwe zvinononoka uye zvinodhura.
home-about-text-3: hCaptcha inobvumidza mawebhusaiti kuti aite mari kushandira ichi chinodikanwa achivharira bots nedzimwe nzira dzekushungurudzwa.
home-about-text-4: Musika weHCaptcha unofambiswa neHUMAN Protocol, yakavhurika yakatemerwa protocol yekuongorora kwevanhu inomhanya paEthereum blockchain. Mawebhusaiti anowana Zviratidzo zvevanhu (HMT) chero nguva vashandisi pavanoshandisa hCaptcha widget pane yavo saiti, uye makambani ekudzidza emuchina anobhadhara Hunhu Zviratidzo kuti dhata ravo rinyorwe.
home-benefits-text-1: Wakaona here pese paunodzvanya pamotokari iwe urikubatsira kudzidzisa imwechete Gigantic kambani yekufunda muchina masystem emahara?
home-benefits-text-2: hCaptcha inoshandura iyi modhi kutenderedza. Paunoshandisa hCaptcha, makambani anobhida pabasa iro vashandisi vako vanoita sezvavanoratidza hunhu hwavo. Iwe unowana mibairo.
home-benefits-text-3: Unoda kudzorera kune yako yaunoda rubatsiro? hCaptcha inoita kuti utsigire masangano anobatsira aunosarudza nemari yaunowana nekuishandisa. Vashandisi pane yako saiti munguva pfupi inotevera vanozoona mupiro wako kusangano kuburikidza nekungwara nyora pane hCaptcha interface.
home-challenges-text-1: ... uye mamwe mabasa akareruka. Yakareruka kuvanhu, yakaoma kune bots.
home-challenges-text-2: Tsika mabasa zvakare anowanikwa kune vebhizinesi vaparidzi.
home-ent-2: Shanyira saiti yedu nyowani yakatsaurirwa: BotStop.com
home-intro-body: Iwe unoshandisa captcha kuchengetedza bots? hCaptcha inodzivirira kuvanzika kwevashandisi, inopa mubairo mawebhusaiti, uye inobatsira makambani kuwana yavo data yakanyorwa. Iko kudonhedza-kutsiva reCAPTCHA: unogona kushandura mukati memaminitsi.
home-intro-head: Mira mamwe mabhoti. Kutanga kuchengetedza kuvanzika kwemushandisi.
home-main-1: Pachivande. Kuchengeteka. Nokukurumidza. Uye isu tinokubhadhara iwe kuti uishandise.
home-main-2c: Ad netiweki anoona vashanyi vako sechigadzirwa. Ye hCaptcha chigadzirwa ibasa ravanopa. Isu hatine hanya nekuti vashandisi vako ndivanaani, chete kuti vangangoita hutsinye sei. Isu tinotsigira zvirongwa senge Yakavanzika Pass, uye tinoshanda nesimba kuenzanisa zvakavanzika uye chengetedzo.
home-main-3c: Kururamisa kuri mune yako kufarira uye neyedu. hCaptcha ndeye muparidzi-akatarisisa. Isu tinoshanda kukupa iwe chaiyo data uye rega iwe usarudze maitiro ekuishandisa. Mamwe macaptch anopihwa nemakambani ekushambadzira eGigantic. Izvi zvinoreva kuti ese bot avanovhara anogona kudzikisa mari yavo.
home-main-4c: Yakaomesesa michina yekudzidza mamodheru anoshandiswa neHCaptcha yekutarisa hunhu. Izvi zvinotibvumira kuti tide mabasa asinganetsi kubva kuvashandisi vako uye tora shoma yenguva yavo mukuita kudaro, vachiri kuburitsa data rakanyorwa rakanakira kunyorera vatengi.
home-main-plans: hCaptcha yakasununguka kushandiswa kune vaparidzi vehukuru hupi. Nekudaro, kune emabhizinesi uye mapuratifomu anoda kuwanda kudzora, edu mabhizinesi mhinduro aripo.
home-main-plans2: hCaptcha bhizinesi mhinduro dzinodzivirira mamirioni evashandisi pamakumi emamirioni emawebhusaiti kune mamwe emakambani makuru pasi rino. Ndapota taura nesu kuti uwane mamwe mashoko, kana kushanyira
home-main-plans3: hCaptcha bhizinesi mhinduro dzinodzivirira mamirioni evashandisi pamakumi emamirioni emawebhusaiti kune mamwe emakambani makuru pasi rino. Ndapota taura nesu kuti uwane mamwe mashoko, kana kushanyira
home-try-it-out-text: hCaptcha inopa yakapusa, yakapusa, uye yakavimbika bhodhi yekuona ichiri diki kuti vanhu vagadzirise.
labeling-about-text-1: hCaptcha yakagadzirirwa kugadzirisa rakanyanya basa rakanyanya dambudziko mukudzidza kwemuchina; kunyorera huwandu hwedata nenzira inokodzera, inokwanisika, uye yakavimbika. Mamwe data anowanzo gadzira zvirinani mukudzidzisa muchina mamodheru modhi. Kubudirira kwazvino kwema modhi akadzika kwakatungamira kune akawedzera makuru maseteti, uye hCaptcha inoshumira ichi chinodiwa.
labeling-about-text-2: Nekudaro, kugadzira makuru makuru akaongororwa nevanhu achishandisa nzira dzechinyakare zvese zvinononoka uye zvinodhura. hCaptcha inzira yemakambani kuti awane zvirevo zvavanoda nekukurumidza, zvine mhando yepamusoro uye nemutengo wakaderera pane dzimwe nzira.
labeling-annotations-text-1: Chinhu chakaringana kuona mumifananidzo uye vhidhiyo
labeling-annotations-text-2: Chinhu chakaringana kuona mumifananidzo uye vhidhiyo
labeling-annotations-text-3: Nongedzera zvirevo kune mazhinji akasiyana kesi dzekushandisa
labeling-annotations-text-4: Ronga kana kuisa zvikamu zvekupokana zvechero saizi
labeling-annotations-text-6: Unoda imwe mhando isina kunyorwa pano? Ingotibvunza isu.
labeling-ent-text-1: HUMAN Platform kuseri kweHCaptcha inopa hunyanzvi hwehunhu hwebasa uye manejimendi maficha kuburikidza neanofungidzira, akasanganiswa, kana SaaS deployments inosangana neako aripo masisitimu.
labeling-ent-text-2: Mhanya zvachose usingaenderane neako neako wega vashandi, track kukosha kwakadyiwa pamabhizimusi mayuniti kana mubatanidzwa vanyowani, sarudza nzira nzira mabasa kune akasiyana emukati kana ekunze vanopa vashandi zvichienderana nemari uye chengetedzo zvinodiwa, uye nezvimwe.
labeling-ent-text-3: Easy API kuwana, akanaka madhibhodhi, uye yazvino modhi-mu-iyo-loop tekinoroji yekuwedzera kugona.
labeling-ent-text-4: 99.99% yekukwirisa SLAs uye 24/7 yepasirese rutsigiro rwuripo. Kuti uwane rumwe ruzivo:
labeling-features-head-2: Yakagadzirirwa mutengo uye mhando. Hapana kuzvipira kwepamberi kunodiwa.
labeling-features-head-3: Chete bhadhara iko iko iko iko kurongeka kwaunoda.
labeling-features-head-4: Ipa rako rechokwadi chokwadi data kana kuti isu ngativake pariri.
labeling-features-text-1: Unoda kubatanidza ongororo yevanhu zvakananga mune rako bhizinesi mashandiro? Isu tinopa yakanyanya kuvimbika SLAs, yakavimbiswa kugona, uye yakapusa REST APIs.
labeling-features-text-2: Iyo HUMAN chikuva inoshandisa yakazara kuvimba mamodheru kuti iite yakakwenenzverwa chaiyo-nguva yemhando kuongororwa. Izvi zvinotibvumidza kuti tikurumidze kuona zvese kuoma kwemibvunzo uye mhinduro yavo ingangoita chaiyo, ichikuchengetera nguva nemari.
labeling-features-text-3: Haasi matambudziko ese akafanana. Zvidimbu zvekuchengetedza-zvakakosha mabasa zvinogona kuda 99.99% kuvimba kubva kune vese vanhu vashandi. Zvidimbu zveimwe beta chinhu mune nharembozha app ingangoda kuzvidzora zvine mwero. Iwe sarudza.
labeling-features-text-4: Iwe une data mbishi here isina yakazara yekuongorora seti? Muzviitiko zvakawanda tinogona kuvaka imwe yako semabasa anomhanya kuburikidza nesystem, kana kugadzira masampu akanyorwa kuti ubvumirwe.
labeling-info-text-1: Taura neimwe yenyanzvi dzeedu domain kuti utsanangure zvaunoda zveprojekti: kururamisa kurongeka, fomati, uye chero zvakakosha zvinodiwa.
labeling-info-text-2: Isu tinoita diki yekugadzira basa zvichibva pane yako yemuenzaniso data. Aya anoedza iro basa ratakaita pamwechete kuona kuti iwe unowana chaizvo izvo zvaunoda.
labeling-info-text-3: Iine yedu yakakwira vhoriyamu uye yakaderera latency isu tinoshandura rako basa kutenderera nekukurumidza, ne otomatiki kuendesa nekukurumidza kana zvangoitwa.
labeling-info-text-4: Sezvo isu tinonzwisisa zvirinani ma parameter ebasa rako rekugadzira, mhedzisiro icharamba ichivandudza nekufamba kwenguva.
labeling-info-text-5: Rarama maradhibhodhi anotendera iwe kuti upe mhinduro kana kumbomira kugadzirwa chero nguva.
labeling-main-1c: Unoda mamwe mavara ematafura ako? hCaptcha inopa inokurumidza, inodhura-inoshanda, uye yakakwira mhando kunyorera dhata kumakambani anoshanda pahungwaru hwekunyepedzera uye mashandiro ekudzidza emuchina.
labeling-main-2c: hCaptcha ine rimwe remadziva akakura pane nyika inowanikwa kuti ushandise. Chero zviyero zvako, tinogona kuzvibata tisina kudhura kumusoro kuzvipira. Mamirioni emabasa pazuva haana dambudziko.
labeling-platform-text: hCaptcha yakavakirwa pane HUMAN Platform, iyo inobvumidza yakakwenenzverwa nzira uye ongororo kukwidziridza mutengo uye kugona padanho rega. Iyi tekinoroji inoita kuti vashandi vepachokwadi vabate chikamu chega chega chebasa rako, ichiwedzera mashandiro emutengo uchichengetedza zvakavanzika uye uchizadzisa zvido zvemutemo zvingashanda.
labeling-try-text: ... isu takagadzirira kana iwe uripo: sevhisi yedu inowanikwa kutenderera nguva.
page-acc-faq-1: Mubvunzo: Ino hCaptcha Chikamu 508 + WCAG 2.0 inoenderana here? Mhinduro: Tinotenda saizvozvo: vese vashandisi vane chero mhando yekuremara vanokwanisa kutarisa webhu uye kuisa zvinyorwa pamafomu vanogona kuwana masevhisi akachengetedzwa ne hCaptcha pakunyoresa. Nekudaro, iri harisi rairo repamutemo: iwe unofanirwa kuita yako wega ongororo, uchifunga nezve yako chaiyo kuitisa kuti uve nechokwadi chekuti iyi ndiyo kesi yekuendeswa kwako.
page-acc-faq-2: Mubvunzo: Uri kushanda pane dzimwe nzira dzekuwanika (a11y), senge odhiyo? Mhinduro: Zvaimbove zvakakurumbira sarudzo senge odhiyo Captchas vanosarura vazhinji vea11y vashandisi uye vanokundwa zviri nyore neazvino michina yekudzidzira michina. Izvi zvakamanikidza zviripo odhiyo odhiyo kuti zvinyanye kuoma, kuunza ruzha, kusanzwisisika kwenguva, kusanzwisisika kwesanganiswa kwemazwi, zvichingodaro kukunda varwisi. Isu nekudaro hatina shungu nezve nzira iyi vs. kudzivisa dambudziko rese, asi tichazvitarisa kana paine kudiwa kubva munharaunda ye11y. Nekudaro, isu tinofarira kwazvo Yakavanzika Pass yeiyo Yekushandisa yekushandisa kesi. Tinotenda kubatanidza yedu yazvino a11y nzira neyakavanzika Pass kuburitswa kuchabvumidza a11y vashandisi kuti vatarise zvakachengeteka, vakachengeteka mukuziva kuti kwavo traffic kune vamwe vari vega, nepo vachidzora kushungurudzwa kunoitwa nevashandisi ve bot izvo zvisingaite zvinoitika kana a11y sarudzo dziripo. Isu tiri vatori vechikamu vanoshingairira mubato rinoshanda reIETF tichienzanisa tekinoroji nyowani iyi.
page-acc-faq-3: Mubvunzo: Ko zvakavanzika? Kunyoresa kunofumura a11y kubhurawuza data neimwe nzira? Unoitei iwe neemail? Mhinduro: hCaptcha yakagadzirirwa zvakavanzika kubva pasi kumusoro. Izvo zvakasiyana zvakanyanya pane zvechinyakare sarudzo senge reCAPTCHA izvo zviri zvemadandemutande, vane kurudziro yekukutevera iwe padandemutande nekukusanganisa iwe neicho chaihwo chitupa. Hatimboshandisa maemail ekuwanika kana info kune chero chinangwa kunze kwekufambisa kushandiswa kwe11y uye kudzivirira kushungurudzwa. Yedu yekuvanzika mutemo ine mhinduro dzakazara uye dzine hungwaru nezve mashandisiro atinoita dhata, asi mhinduro pfupi ndeyekuti isu hatine hanya nekukusanganisa iwe semunhu ane yako yekutsvagisa nhoroondo. tichiri kuchengetedza kugona kwedu kudzivirira kushungurudzwa, kuchizadzisa yedu Yekuvanzika Pass basa.
page-acc-link-1: Kana iwe uri mushandisi wekuwanika, ndapota nyorera pano.
page-acc-subhead: Kuvimbisa kuwana musono kune vese vashandisi apo uchichengetedza chengetedzo
page-acc-summary-contents-1: hCaptcha yakagadzirirwa kumisa bots nekuvasiyanisa kubva kuvanhu. Miedzo yekuona chishandiso chakanakira izvi, asi havazi vese vanogona kugadzirisa chinetso chekuona. Neichi chikonzero isu takagadzira imwe yakapusa, isingarwadzire kurega vaparidzi vachishandisa sevhisi yedu kuchengetedza kuwanikwa kune vese vane yakazara Chikamu 508 uye WCAG 2.0 kutevedzera.
page-acc-summary-contents-2: Iyo inoshanda sei: kutanga, mushandisi anowanikwa anosaina kuiyi URL, iyo inosunganidzwa muiyo hCaptcha widget info peji. Vanopihwa cookie yakavharika iyo inogona kushandiswa kakawanda pazuva, asi inofanira kuzorodzwa maawa makumi maviri nemana kuburikidza nekupinda mukati.
page-acc-tr-body: Mubvunzo: Ndichiri kuona dambudziko mushure mekumisa cookie. Chii chiri kukonzeresa izvi? Mhinduro: Izvi zvinowanzoitika nekuda kwekushandisa zvine hukasha ad blocker kana anti-kuki kuwedzera, kana kuiswa kunovhara macrosa-saiti makuki, mune ino kuki yeiyo hcaptcha.com iyo yakaiswa kana kuongororwa neiyo hCaptcha JavaScript pane imwe saiti. , kufanana neiya wauri kushanyira. hCaptcha yekuwanika makuki anoshanda neese akakurumbira mabhurawuza uye ad blockers ane yavo yakajairwa masetingi, saka kazhinji kukundikana kuri kukonzerwa neanti-anti-adblock zvinyorwa kana zvakafanana seteteti yakanangana nemamwe masayiti. Mhinduro: 1. Whitelist hcaptcha.com uye * .hcaptcha.com makuki mune yako ad blocker kana browser yekuwedzera yekuwedzera. 2. Kana iwe uri kushandisa iyo Yakashinga browser, iyo isinga (kubva muna Kubvumbi 2020) inoita kunge iine chero rudzi rwecokie whitelist, enda kune Zvinodiwa -> Shields -> Cookies uye sarudza Bvumira maKuki ese. 3. Kana iwe urikushandisa yazvino vhezheni yeSafari pane iyo ichangobva kuburitswa OS X 10.15 kana iOS 13. 4, Apple ichango chinja maitiro eSafari ane hukama neyechitatu-bato makuki, ichivharira ese nekutadza. Tiri kushandisa mhinduro, asi parizvino ndokumbira ushanyire Safari Zvamada, Chikamu cheZvakavanzika, uye usatarisise Webhusaiti yekutevera: Dzivirira nzira yekuyambuka -saiti kuitira kuti cookie yekuwanika ishande sezvaitarisirwa. Mubvunzo: Ini ndinoshandisa akawanda madivayiri. Ini ndinofanira kusaina kakawanda? Mhinduro: Kwete. Ndokumbirawo ubaye imwechete email yekunyorera link yakatumirwa kwauri pane yega yega kifaa yaunoshandisa kuitira kumisikidza cookie.
page-acc-tr-title: YeVashandisi Ekuwanika: Q&A uye Troubleshooting Nongedzo
priv-hc-text: Ad netiweki anokuona iwe sechigadzirwa chavo. Hatidi. Isu hatinei nekuti vashandisi ndevapi, chete kuti vangangoita hutsinye sei. Isu tinotsigira zvirongwa senge Yakavanzika Pass, uye tinoshanda nesimba kuenzanisa zvakavanzika uye chengetedzo.
reporting-bugs-accessibility-text: Iwe wakaona zvisingaite here kana neimwe nzira haugone kupedzisa hCaptchas?
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-1: Nhanho 1: Vhura Zvishandiso Zvekuvandudza (Izvi zvinotanga kurekodha chikamu.)
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-2: Nhanho 2: Dzvanya paNetwork tab muDhijitari Zvishandiso. Tarisa iyo Persist matanda bhokisi kumusoro.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-3: Nhanho 3: shanyira https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, kana iyo webhusaiti iwe yauri kunetsa pa (Chakavanzika Chengetedzo: chete kana iwe usina hanya kugovana zvazviri) ... wobva wadzvanya iyo I ndiri bhatani revanhu, uye edza kugadzirisa.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-4: Nhanho 4: Dzvanya HAR mushure mekuyedza kugadzirisa, uye sarudza Sevha Zvese seHAR kusevha iyo network log. Tumira iyo faira kwatiri.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-5: Nhanho 5: Dzvanya pane iyo Console tebhu, uye kurudyi-tinya ipapo Sarudza ese uye chengeta icho mune chinyorwa faira, kuitira kuchengetedza iyo console danda. Titumireiwo izvozvo.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-6: Chekupedzisira nhanho: Tumira email iwo HAR uye nyaradza mafaira egi kwatiri, uye tsanangura dambudziko Shandisa: support@hcaptcha.com (ndapota shandisa sevhisi yakaita seDropbox kana Filebin uye utumire zvinongedzo) uye nechisarudzo skrini, kana uchifungidzira kuti pane chimwe chinhu chisiri kuratidza nenzira kwayo. . Ndokumbira utumire iyo IP yauri kushandisa futi. Unogona kuiwana kubva https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Thanks nekutora nguva kutibatsira kuwana iyi info! Takazvipira kuita hCaptcha ishande zvakanaka kune wese munhu.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-1: Nhanho 1: Vhura Zvishandiso Zvekuvandudza (Izvi zvinotanga kurekodha chikamu.)
reporting-bugs-guide-step-2: Nhanho 2: Dzvanya paNetwork tab muDhijitari Zvishandiso. Tarisa bhokisi reKuchengetedza bhokisi kumusoro.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-3: Nhanho 3: shanyira https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, kana iyo webhusaiti iwe yauri kunetsa pa (Chakavanzika Chengetedzo: chete kana iwe usina hanya kugovana zvazviri) ... wobva wadzvanya iyo I ndiri bhatani revanhu, uye edza kugadzirisa.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-4: Nhanho 4: Dzvanya Export HAR (iyo diki pasi museve) mushure mekuyedza kugadzirisa, iyo inochengetedza iyo network danda. Tumira iyo faira kwatiri.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-5: Nhanho 5: Dzvanya pane iyo Console tebhu, uye kurudyi-tinya ipapo Sevha se .. kuitira kuti uchengetedze danda rekunyaradza. Titumireiwo izvozvo.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-6: Chekupedzisira nhanho: Tumira email iwo HAR uye nyaradza marogi mafaira kwatiri, uye tsanangura dambudziko. Shandisa: support@hcaptcha.com (ndapota shandisa sevhisi yakaita seDropbox kana Filebin uye utumire zvinongedzo) uye nechisarudzo skrini, kana uchifungidzira kuti pane chimwe chinhu chisiri kuratidza nemazvo. Ndokumbira utumire iyo IP yauri kushandisa futi. Unogona kuiwana kubva https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Thanks nekutora nguva kutibatsira kuwana iyi info! Takazvipira kuita hCaptcha ishande zvakanaka kune wese munhu.
reporting-bugs-guide-text-1: Kutumira mashoko ekugadzirisa dambudziko nemushumo wako zvichaita kuti zvive nyore kwatiri kuti tizive zviri kuitika. Heano nhanho-nhanho mirairo:
reporting-bugs-guide-text-2: Kana iwe uri mugadziri wewebhu kana mushandisi nyanzvi, pfupiso yacho tinoda kuti utitumire network kurekodha HAR uye browser danda rekutakura. Ndokumbirawo edza kuremadza chero kushambadzira blocker kana browser chengetedzo yekuwedzera kutanga uye wozoyedza usati wapfuura nhanho idzi. Kana izvozvo zvikagadzirisa dambudziko rako, tingadai tichikoshesa iwe kutizivisa yako browser vhezheni, kushambadzira blocker kana kuwedzera browser, uye webhusaiti URL.
reporting-bugs-intro-text: Mamirioni avanhu anoshandisa hCaptcha mwedzi wega, pane zviuru zvemubatanidzwa wemabhurawuza, ekuwedzeredza, zvishandiso, firewall uye zvimwe. Chinangwa chedu ndechekuti ive nechokwadi chekuti inogara ichikushandira, saka tinotenda zvikuru mishumo yako! Kuti upe mhinduro nekukurumidza, ingotinya bhatani reTumira mhinduro. Kana iwe uchiona iri rinoshanda nyaya, ndokumbirawo uteedzere debug log rairo yeChannel kana debug log rairo yeFirefox pazasi. Kune chero mamwe mabhurawuza ingotitumira email. Nezve zvingangoitika kuchengetedzeka kana zvakavanzika nyaya, ona rairo pazasi.
reporting-bugs-privacy-text: Isu hatinei nekuti vashandisi ndevapi, chete mukana wekuti vave nehuipi kana michina. Isu tinotsigira zvirongwa senge Yakavanzika Pass, uye tinoshanda nesimba kuenzanisa zvakavanzika uye chengetedzo. Kana iwe wawana nyaya yaunofunga kuti inogona kukanganisa kuvanzika kwevashandisi, ndapota email kwatiri pa support@hcaptcha.com.
reporting-bugs-provide-feedback-text: Tinotenda mazano ako. Regai tizive chero nyaya uye isu tozozvigadzirisa nekukurumidza.
reporting-bugs-security-text: Isu tinogara tichifarira kugamuchira mishumo yezvidziviriro zvetsikidzi. Email support@hcaptcha.com & CC security@hcaptcha.com uye tichadzoka kwauri nekukurumidza. Isu zvakare tine bug bounty chirongwa cheanokodzera kuchengetedzeka mishumo pane hCaptcha sevhisi uye inoenderana sosi kodhi.
sec-hc-text: hCaptcha ndeye muparidzi-akatarisisa. Isu tinoshanda kupa masayiti data chairo uye kuvarega vasarudze maitiro ekuishandisa. Kururamisa kuri mune yako kufarira uye neyedu. Mamwe macaptch anopiwa nemakambani ekushambadzira. Ose bot avanovhara anogona kudzikisa mari yavo.
what-is-hcaptcha-text: hCaptcha inobatsira mawebhusaiti aunofarira kuchengetedza bots, spam, uye kushungurudza nekubvunza mibvunzo yakapusa iri nyore kuvanhu uye yakaoma kumachina.
why-hc-text: Nguva imwe neimwe paunopindura dambudziko, tinoshandisa mamodheru akaomesesa kuona kuti uri munhu here kana muchina. Iyo webhusaiti yawakashanyira yobva yashandisa iyi mhedzisiro kubatsira kuvandudza ruzivo rwako pane yavo saiti nekuchengeta kunze bots.
